# Ingest the data
## Meteorite Landings


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

df = read.csv("archetypes/meteorite-landings/meteorite-landings.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


# Dot map
## Meteor shape


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.width=13, fig.height=8}

df_sorted <- df[order(df$mass),]

# PLOT NATURAL EARTH BORDERS
ne_world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
# class(ne_world)

# removes Antarctica
# ne_world <- filter(ne_world, iso_a3 != "ATA") 

# theme parameters
theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

v1 <- ggplot(data = ne_world) +
  # map feature styling
  geom_sf(fill="white", color="#888888", stroke=0.5) +
  # dot parameters
  geom_point( data = df_sorted, aes(x=reclong, y=reclat, color=mass), shape=8, size=1.5) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "yellow", high = "red", na.value = NA) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x=NULL,
       y=NULL,
       title = "Meteorite Landings", 
       subtitle="Color by mass") +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 13, height_svg = 7,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```


# Dark theme
## Using magnitude and alpha as a visual variable


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.width=13, fig.height=10}

# theme parameters
theme_dark_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  #bpanel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  #plot.background = element_blank(),
)

v2 <- ggplot(data = ne_world) +
  # map feature styling
  geom_sf(fill="transparent", color="#444444", stroke=0.5) +
  # dot parameters
  geom_point( data = df_sorted, aes(x=reclong, y=reclat, color=mass, alpha=mass), shape = 8, size = 1.5) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "yellow", high = "red", na.value = NA) +
  scale_alpha_binned() +
  labs(x=NULL,
       y=NULL,
       title = "Meteorite Landings", 
       subtitle="Color and alpha by mass") +
  dark_theme_bw() +
  theme_dark_opts

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 13, height_svg = 10,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
